[vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”39063″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][vc_column_text el_class=”page-title-overlap”]

POSTGRADUATE STUDIES

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575835851507{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1580395600118{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”content-section space16″]

UNIWA offers a series of Postgraduate Programs (MSc), organized either autonomously or in collaboration with other Higher Education Institutions. The aim of the postgraduate programs is to further educate students and offer them scientific specialization in subjects related to the specific scientific field being pursued.

The undergraduate programs of the UNIPA departments confer a Postgraduate Diploma in a relevant scientific field or specialization. Selection, admission, duration, curricula and other operating procedures, are defined in the Regulation of Graduate Studies.

The fifty-eight Masters programs offered at UNIPA to both its graduates and the graduates of other domestic and foreign Universities, contribute to the deepening and specialization of knowledge and research in a variety of disciplines.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=”” el_class=”col-margin-15″][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=”” el_class=”col-margin-15″][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”26px” css=”.vc_custom_1576446523186{background-color: #064270 !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”content-section content-side-menu-links”]

SCHOOL OF ADMINISTRATIVE, ECONOMICS AND SOCIAL SCIENCES

Department of Archival, Library and Information Studies

MSc in Information Management in Libraries, Archives, Museums

Department of Business Administration

MSc in Port Organization, Operation Development and Management

MSc in Management of Health and Social Care Services

MSc in Management of Educational Organizations

MSc in Public Administration – Public Management

Master in Business Administration (MBA)

MSc in Educational Technology and Human Resources Development
In collaboration with the Department of Primary Education of the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens

Department of Accounting and Finance

MSc in Public Economics and Policy

MSc in Finance and Shipping

MSc in Applied Accounting, Auditing and Taxation

Department of Tourism Management

MSc in Innovation and Entrepreneurship in Tourism
In collaboration with the Department of Business Administration of University of the Aegean

M.Sc in Operations Management with specialization in «Agrotourism, Winetourism and Regional Development» or in «Tourism Business Cultural and Educational Operations»
In collaboration with the Department of Wine, Vine and Beverage of the University of West Attica and the Faculty of Production Engineering and Management of the Technical University of Crete

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=”” el_class=”col-margin-15″][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”26px” css=”.vc_custom_1576446546292{background-color: #6b60a5 !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”content-section content-side-menu-links”]

SCHOOL OF APPLIED ARTS & CULTURE

Department of Graphic and Visual Communication Design

MSc in Intelligent Packaging, New Technologies & Marketing

MSc in Animation (2 dimensional and 3-D animation)

Department of Interior Architecture

MSc in Interior Architecture: Sustainable and Social Design

Department of Conservation of Antiquities and Works of Art

MSc in Conservation and Heritage Science

MSc in Museum Studies
In collaboration with the Department of History & Archaeology and the Department of Geology and Geoenvironment of the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens

Department of Photography and Audiovisual Arts

MSc in Photography: Research and Methodology

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=””][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”26px” css=”.vc_custom_1576446565117{background-color: #029bcd !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”content-section content-side-menu-links”]

SCHOOL OF PUBLIC HEALTH

Department of Public and Community Health

MSc in Health Promotion

MSc in Environmental Communication and Health Promotion

MSc in Health Promotion in Third Age

MSc in Epidemiology and Health Promotion

MSc in Environmental health and communication in general and special education and training

Department of Public Health Policies

MSc in Public Health

MSc in Occupational and Environmental Health

MSc in Leadership, Innovation, and Value Based Health Policies

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=””][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”26px” css=”.vc_custom_1576446536749{background-color: #e44232 !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”content-section content-side-menu-links”]

SCHOOL OF HEALTH AND CARE SCIENCES

Department of Biomedical Sciences

MSc in Biomedical Methods and Technology in Diagnosis

MSc in Advanced Aesthetics and Cosmetology: Development – Quality Control and Safety of the new cosmetics products

MSc in Pedagogy by Innovative Technologies and Biomedical Approaches
In collaboration with the Department of  Early Childhood Care and Education of the University of West Attica (UNIWA) and the Department of Education of the School of Pedagogical and Technological Education (ASPETE)

MSc in Contemporary Applications of Medical Depiction

MSc in Applications of Biomedical Technology in Infertility – Male and Female Factor (interdepartmental)

MSc in Applied Prosthetic Dental Technology

Cell and Gene Therapies: from bench to bedside and Good Manufacturing Practices
In collaboration with Patras Medical School (School of Biomedical Sciences)

Department of Midwifery

MSc in Advanced and Applied Obstetric Care

MSc by Research in Female Reproduction
In collaboration with the School of Medicine (National and Kapodistrian University of Athens)

Department of Nursing

MSc in Treatment and Care of Wounds and Ulcers

MSc in Chronic Disease Management

MSc in Community and Public Health Nursing

MSc in Applied Clinical Nursing

MSc in Intensive Care Units – Cardiac, Medical and Nursing Care
In collaboration with the School of Medicine (National and Kapodistrian University of Athens)

Department of Physiotherapy

MSc in New Methods in Physiotherapy

Department of Public and Community Health

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=””][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”26px” css=”.vc_custom_1576446555974{background-color: #329650 !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”content-section content-side-menu-links”]

SCHOOL OF FOOD SCIENCES

Department of Food Science and Technology

MSc in Food Innovation, Quality and Safety

Department of Wine, Vine and Beverage Sciences

MSc in Wine and Beer Science

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=””][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”26px” css=”.vc_custom_1576446514974{background-color: #ff7f00 !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”content-section content-side-menu-links”]

SCHOOL OF ENGINEERING

Department of Surveying and Geoinformatics Engineering

MSc in Geospatial Technologies

Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering

MSc in Communications and Data Networks

MSc by Research in Electrical and Electronics Engineering

MSc in Management and Optimization of Energy Systems

MSc in Audio, Video and Broadcasting Engineering

MSc in Internet of Things (ΙοΤ) and Smart Environments

MSc in Information and Communication Technologies for Education
In collaboration with the Department of Early Childhood Education and the Department of Communication and Media Studies of National and Kapodistrian University of Athens and the Department of Architecture of University of Thessaly

MSc in Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning (Interdepartmental)

Department of Biomedical Engineering

MSc in Advanced Systems & Methods in Biomedical Technology

MSc in Biomedical Engineering and Technology

Department of Naval Architecture

MSc in Advanced Technologies in Naval Architecture and Marine Engineering

Department of Informatics and Computer Engineering

MSc in Informatics and Applications MSc in Science and Technology of Informatics and Computers

MSc in Digital Transformation and Educational Practice
In collaboration with the Department of Philosophy, Pedagogy & Psychology of the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens and the Department of Education of the School of Pedagogical and Technological Education (ASPETE)

MSc in Cybersecurity
In collaboration with Moldovia and Kazakhstan

MSc in Next Generation Communication Networks and Distributed Application Environments

Department of Industrial Design and Production Engineering

MSc in Industrial Automation

MSc in Unmanned Autonomous and Remote Controlled Systems

MSc in New Technologies in Shipping and Transport
In collaboration with the Department of Shipping, Trade and Transport of University of the Aegean

MSc in Advanced Studies in Textile Technology

Department of Civil Engineering

MSc in Energy and Earthquake Upgrading of Structures and Sustainable Development (MSc in Structural Engineering)

MSc in Architectural and Structural Restoration of Historic Buildings and Ensembles

MSc in Applied Policies and Technologies for Environmental Protection

MSc in Integrated Design of Hydraulic and Geotechnical Structures

Department of Mechanical Engineering

MSc in Energy and Environmental Developments

MSc in Oil & Gas Process Systems Engineering

MSc Advanced Product Design Engineering & Manufacturing
In collaboration with the Faculty of Science Engineering & Computing of Kingston University London

MSc in Energy Systems
In collaboration with the University of Heriot Watt (Scotland)

MSc by Research in Thermofluids

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
